heroSection.title: About Alumni Portal
heroSection.subtitle: Connecting Alumni, Building Networks, Creating Opportunities
heroSection.description: A comprehensive platform designed to strengthen the bond between our institution and its alumni, fostering lifelong connections and professional growth.

aboutProject.title: About the Project
aboutProject.description: The Alumni Portal is a modern, comprehensive platform designed to bridge the gap between our institution and its distinguished alumni community. This project aims to create a vibrant ecosystem where former students can reconnect, share experiences, and contribute to the growth of current students.

features.title: Alumni Directory
features.description: Comprehensive search and filter system to find and connect with fellow alumni

features.title: Interactive Dashboard
features.description: Personalized dashboard with news, events, and networking opportunities

features.title: Real-time Communication
features.description: Chat system and notifications to keep the community connected

features.title: Career Opportunities
features.description: Job postings and mentorship programs for career advancement

features.title: Success Stories
features.description: Platform to share achievements and inspire fellow alumni

aboutInstitution.title: DAV public School Jhanjharpur
aboutInstitution.description: DAV public School Jhanjharpur stands as a beacon of educational excellence in Punjab, India. Established with the vision of providing quality education and nurturing future leaders, our institution has been a cornerstone of academic achievement and personal development for decades.
aboutInstitution.history: Founded in 2002, DAV public School Jhanjharpur has been committed to the principles of Arya Samaj and the educational philosophy of Maharishi Dayanand Saraswati. Over the years, the college has evolved into a premier educational institution, consistently ranked among the top colleges in the region.
aboutInstitution.vision: To be a leading institution of higher education that empowers students with knowledge, skills, and values necessary for success in an increasingly complex and interconnected world.
aboutInstitution.mission: To provide high-quality education that combines academic excellence with practical learning, fostering critical thinking, innovation, and ethical leadership among our students.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: Striving for the highest standards in education and research

values.title: Innovation
values.description: Embracing new ideas and technologies to enhance learning

values.title: Integrity
values.description: Maintaining honesty and ethical principles in all our endeavors

values.title: Inclusivity
values.description: Creating an environment where everyone feels valued and respected

values.title: Service
values.description: Contributing to society through education and community engagement

achievements: Active placement cell with 95% placement rate

aboutDevelopers.title: Meet the Development Team
aboutDevelopers.description: This alumni portal is crafted with passion and dedication by a team of talented developers who believe in the power of technology to connect people and create meaningful experiences.

team.name: Rauhl kumar
team.description: Man behind the project, specializing in full-stack development, UI/UX design, and the createion of innovative web applications which we are using here.
team.quote: one man army behind this project.

team.name: Rohit Kumar
team.description: Expert in backend development, database management, and API integration, ensuring the portal runs smoothly and efficiently.
team.quote: Ensuring the portal runs smoothly and efficiently.

team.name: Sahil Kumar
team.description: Specializes in creating responsive and interactive user interfaces, enhancing the user experience of the portal.
team.quote: Creating responsive and interactive user interfaces.

team.name: Aman Kumar
team.description: Responsible for the overall look and feel of the portal, ensuring a user-friendly and visually appealing design.
team.quote: Ensuring a user-friendly and visually appealing design.

developmentProcess.description: Comprehensive requirement analysis and UI/UX design
Building responsive and interactive user interfaces
Creating robust APIs and database architecture
Connecting all components and thorough testing

testimonials.name: Dr. Rahul Kumar
testimonials.message: This alumni portal has revolutionized how we connect with our former students. It's a testament to modern technology serving educational excellence.

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.message: The platform has made alumni engagement seamless and effective. We've seen a 300% increase in alumni participation since its launch.

testimonials.name: Amit Singh
testimonials.message: Finally, a platform that keeps me connected with my alma mater and fellow alumni. The user experience is exceptional!

contactInfo.title: Get in Touch
contactInfo.description: Have questions about the portal or want to contribute? We'd love to hear from you!
